name: traffic-analysis-system
description: Sistema completo de análisis de tráfico con detección de placas y ML
author: Traffic Analysis Team

scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:shared && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:shared && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:backend
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared
